column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been a fan of Smoque for years.  Their food is consistently wonderful
column3: the restaurant is well kept (especially for a BBQ place).  They still have some of the best brisket in the area
column4: but don't let that deter you from the pulled pork (or the ribs for that matter
column5: but I feel the other two are better).  The sides are all fabulous
column6: especial their mac and cheese and their baked beans.
